title: Evaluating functions
text: Given the equation for a function, we should replace the input variable in the equation with the value provided and then calculate the result.

title: Replacement
text: Replace the variable x with -3, and we get $$f(-3)=-5{\left(-3\right)}^2+2\left(-3\right)-1$$.

title: Calculation
text: Calculate the expression $$-5{\left(-3\right)}^2+2\left(-3\right)-1$$. What do you get?
